# The Rule

[![The Rule - Comic by Alison Bechdel](images/Bechdel_Test.jpg)](https://dykestowatchoutfor.com/the-rule/)

## Packages

```{r packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(DT)
```

```{webr-r}
#| context: setup

library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(DT)
```

```{r}
bechdel |>
  select(year, title, clean_test, binary) |>
DT::datatable()
```
### Randomly select a movie

```{webr}
bechdel |>
  slice_sample(n = 1) |>
  select(year, title, clean_test, binary)
```

### Randomly select several movies and summarize pass and fail.

```{webr}
set.seed(17) # to keep the same results even as we increase the sample

(bechdel_sample <- bechdel |>
  filter(year >= 2000 & year <= 2010) |>
  slice_sample(n = 10)) |>
  select(year, title, clean_test, binary)


bechdel_sample |>
  count(binary)
```
